page.title: 03AIR FORCE CONNECTIONS
page.content: Air Force Connections {In our area we have a field called the {horse field.During the Second World {War lots of tents were put up in the {horse field.In the tents were American {soldiers.They wanted to keep the {horses in the field but they gave them {the wrong food and the horses were {taken out. My Nana used to give the {Americans butter, milk,bread and eggs. { There were connections {from the field to Folkingham airfield. {The airfield was a Dakota field and {there are some buildings left,with the {writing the soldiers wrote on them. {The American soldiers were part of {operation'Market Garden'which took {place around the bridge at Arnhem. }
